## Goal
Describe the app, features, and what “done” looks like.

## Checklist
- [ ] Basic UI
- [ ] Core logic
- [ ] Edge cases handled
- [ ] Accessibility pass (focus, labels, contrast)
- [ ] README with screenshot/gif
- [ ] Deployed (Netlify/Vercel/pages) & link added to repo README

## Extras (optional)
- [ ] Tests
- [ ] Dark mode / theming
- [ ] Performance pass
